author: Robin Hebert

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content:
Dear Robin,
Really appreciate for rating us! Your request was already reported to the Magic team. We will try our best to add this feature in next version ASAP. As we really wanna get 5 stars, so badly!

title: Any way to get out of 24 hour?

author: Ted Miller
comment: You'll check your wrist just to watch the colors stack up.

reply.content:
Hi Ted, Really appreciate for rating us. We will try our best to create more unique faces for you guys!
